channel.title: Develoer on Gonzalo's thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Develoer on Gonzalo's thoughts

item.title: “Serverless” in three minutes
item.description: Imagine you are interviewing some guy for an IT role and she says that he doesn’t get that of “going to the cloud because everybody knows there are no datacenters in the sky”. Everybody knows that cloud in cloud computing is just a name. However, it’s surprising how many people have a similar idea. You chat with someone in IT about “serverless” and she says something like “Serverless doesn’t make any sense.
